data.title: Ideas for Experiences at and Around Comwell Bygholm Park
data.meta_description: We give you a guide to the best attractions, activities and sights in Horsens when you stay at Comwell Bygholm Park.
data.text:
Good walking and running routes

Do you prioritize the freedom to use nature for your daily exercise? Then Comwell Bygholm Park is perfect for you! Here, you are surrounded by the beautiful Bygholm Park and close to Åbjergskoven and Bygholm Lake, which has a popular hiking trail all the way around at approximately 7 km.

Bike rental

At Comwell Bygholm Park, you can borrow bikes for free, allowing you to conveniently explore the surrounding nature and quickly reach the city, where there are plenty of opportunities for shopping and trying local eateries.

Games and Disc-golf In The Park

At the hotel, you can play darts, and if you want to try something new and different, we offer equipment for Disc Golf, which can be played in the park just outside. It's both fun and provides a good opportunity for entertainment, competition, and physical activity for all participants.

Horsens City Square

The city's largest collection of shops, where you'll also find cafes and various activities.

Read more: https://bytorvhorsens.dk/

The Prison Museum

Just 2.5 km from Comwell Bygholm Park is the former Horsens State Prison, which opened in 2012 as a cultural gathering point. There are concerts, events, activities, a brasserie, and a museum where visitors can learn about life as an inmate and experience an 18-meter escape tunnel.

Read more: https://www.faengslet.dk/

The Industrial Museum

Discover the history of how Denmark became modern and what new technology meant for ordinary people. The Industrial Museum offers many experiences and activities that are exciting for both children and adults. The museum is located about 3 km from Comwell Bygholm Park.

Read more: https://industrimuseet.dk/

Horsens Art Museum

Get inspired by the world of art when you visit Horsens Art Museum, located just over 3.5 km from the hotel. There are changing exhibitions, a cafe, and a program with several activities.

Read more: https://horsenskunstmuseum.dk/

Horsens New Theater

The city's cultural centre and stage for both large and small concerts, events, and entertainment. At Horsens New Theater, there is current entertainment for both children and adults.

Read more: https://horsensnyteater.dk/

Forum Horsens

Forum Horsens is the venue for great experiences when it comes to music, sports, fairs, and much more. Keep an eye on the program at https://forumhorsens.dk/

Aqua Forum

In Forum Horsens, you'll find Aqua Forum, a water park with something for both young and older children. There is also a wellness area with a sauna, steam bath, and tylarium.

Read more: https://forumhorsens.dk/p/aqua-forum

Bygholm Lake

Bygholm Lake Looking for a good place to run, cycle, or take a peaceful walk? Then try a trip around Bygholm Lake. The entire walking route around the lake is approximately 7 km.

Read more: https://www.kystlandet.dk/kystlandet/planlaeg-turen/bygholm-soe-gdk677431

Åbjerg Forest

In continuation of Bygholm Park and right by Bygholm Lake is Åbjerg Forest. There are good paths for both mountain biking and hiking.

Erik Menved's Castle

In the corner of Bygholm Park are the remains of Erik Menved's castle. It is a medieval castle from 1313, and today you can see the remains of the building's foundation and a few moats.

Golf Course

A few kilometres north of Comwell Bygholm Park is Horsnes Golf Club. Here you will find, among other things, an 18-hole championship course with beautiful lakes and streams.

Read more: https://www.horsensgolfklub.dk/

Beach

Even though you are staying in the city, it is easy and quick to get to the water. Try a lovely beach and enjoy a refreshing swim on the beautiful sandy beaches.

Read more: https://www.kystlandet.dk/kystlandet/oplevelser/natur/strande-og-badesoeer-naer-horsens

A trip to Endelave

Named Island of the Year in 2020-2021. If you have never heard of Endelave, maybe now is the time to hop on the ferry and experience beautiful nature, rabbits, and a lot of activities organized by local enthusiasts.

Read more: https://www.oenendelave.dk/
